edu.uga.cs.recdawgs.entity

Interface Match

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Persistable

    public interface Match
extends Persistable
    This class represents a match between two teams participating in the same sports league. The match is played at a sports venue. The match, once completed, should have a results, which is indicated by the points scored by the home team and the away team (the points must not be negative).
